title: A waying and considering of the Interim by the honourworthy and highly learned Phillip Melancthon. Tra[n]slated into Englyshe by Iohn Rogers
author: Melanchthon, Philipp, 1497-1560.
publicationDate: the vi daie of Auguste, the yere of our lorde. M.D.XLVIII. 1548]
publisher: in Fletestrete at the signe of the Sunne ouer against the conduite by Edwarde Whitchurche,
notes: A translation, by John Rogers, of: Melanchthon, Philipp. Bedencken suffs Interim.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
